text: If anyone has completed an UKRI funding application recently that included a Data Management Plan, I would be very grateful for advice or to see your plan. I'm writing one at the moment. The online example is not particularly helpful. Current colleagues have not required this for their recent applications. Thanks!

attachments.title: Writing a Data Management Plan
attachments.text: When developing a project or applying for funding you are likely to need a Data Management Plan.
